translations.chinese: 紀信乃乘王車，黃屋左纛，曰：「食盡，漢王降楚。」
translations.english: Ji Xin then rode in the king's chariot with yellow canopy and left banner, saying: "Food is exhausted. King Han surrenders to Chu."

translations.chinese: 楚皆呼萬歲，之城東觀，以故漢王得與數十騎出西門遁。
translations.english: All the Chu troops shouted ten thousand years. They went to the east wall to watch, so King Han was able to escape with several dozen cavalry through the west gate.

translations.chinese: 令御史大夫周苛、魏豹、樅公守滎陽。
translations.english: He ordered Imperial Secretary Zhou Ke, Wei Bao, and Lord Song to defend Xingyang.

translations.chinese: 羽見紀 信，問：「漢王安在？」
translations.english: Xiang Yu saw Ji Xin and asked: "Where is King Han?"
